channel.title: Development-Seed on Loïc Houpert
channel.description: Recent content in Development-Seed on Loïc Houpert

item.title: Joining Development Seed to Build Earth Observation Infrastructure
item.description: Excited to announce I’m joining Development Seed as a Cloud Engineer to work on geospatial infrastructure for ESA and ECMWF. From oceanographic fieldwork to satellite data engineering, my journey with Earth observations continues!
